createToken(string,string,uint256,string.details: Only callable by the Registry contract

params._initialSupply: Total tokens to mint (in wei units with 18 decimals)
params._name: The display name of the property (e.g. "Luxury Villa")
params._realtor: Address that will receive all minted tokens

returns.tokenAddress: The address of the newly deployed PropertyToken

createToken(string,string,uint256,string.notice: Deploys a new ERC20 token contract for property tokenization
